title: Binding of holes and competing spin-charge order in simple and extended Hubbard model on cylindrical lattice: An exact diagonalization study
summary: We investigate the binding of holes and the emergence of competing spin-charge order in the simple and extended Hubbard model using exact diagonalization on the 3x4 cylindrical lattice. For the simple Hubbard model (V=0), we find weakly bound hole pairing mediated by magnetic correlations at intermediate repulsive U, without any evidence of phase separation. Introducing nearest-neighbor interaction V reveals a rich phase diagram: attractive V drives multi-hole clustering and phase separation with localized magnetic quenching, while repulsive V stabilizes charge-density-wave (CDW) order that coexists with bound hole pairs within a modulated magnetic background. At strong coupling (U=10), the competition sharpens, with attractive V overcoming on-site repulsion to form magnetically quenched clusters and repulsive V producing robust CDW order that constrains pairing. Real-space analysis of spin and charge correlations provides microscopic evidence of distinct binding mechanisms -- phase separation versus correlation-mediated pairing -- depending on the sign and strength of intersite interaction V . Our results establish a comprehensive picture of how nonlocal Coulomb interactions reshape the landscape of hole-binding and collective order in correlated electron systems.

AI.tldr: 通过精确对角化研究简单和扩展哈伯德模型中空穴结合与竞争性自旋-电荷有序的出现，发现非局域库仑相互作用V的符号和强度决定不同的结合机制：相分离与关联介导配对。
AI.motivation: 研究非局域库仑相互作用如何影响强关联电子系统中空穴结合和集体有序的形成，理解相分离与关联介导配对之间的竞争机制。
AI.method: 在3x4圆柱晶格上对简单哈伯德模型(U)和扩展哈伯德模型(U+V)进行精确对角化，通过实空间自旋和电荷关联分析微观结合机制。
AI.result: 简单哈伯德模型(U=0)中，中等排斥U下通过磁关联实现弱结合空穴配对，无相分离。引入V后：吸引V驱动多空穴团簇和相分离，伴随局域磁淬灭；排斥V稳定电荷密度波(CDW)序，与调制磁背景中的空穴对共存。强耦合(U=10)下竞争加剧，吸引V克服在位排斥形成磁淬灭团簇，排斥V产生约束配对的稳健CDW序。
AI.conclusion: 非局域库仑相互作用V的符号和强度重塑空穴结合和集体有序的图景：吸引V导致相分离和磁淬灭，排斥V促进CDW序和约束配对，揭示了相分离与关联介导配对之间的竞争机制。

title: Structure Prediction of Ionic Epitaxial Interfaces with Ogre Demonstrated for Colloidal Heterostructures of Lead Halide Perovskites
summary: Colloidal epitaxial heterostructures are nanoparticles composed of two different materials connected at an interface, which can exhibit properties different from those of their individual components. Combining dissimilar materials offers opportunities to create several functional heterostructures. Yet, assessing structural compatibility (the main prerequisite for epitaxial growth) is challenging when pairing complex materials with different lattice parameters/crystal structures. This complicates both the selection of target heterostructures for synthesis and the assignment of interface models when new heterostructures are obtained. Here, we demonstrate Ogre as a powerful tool to accelerate the design and characterization of colloidal heterostructures. To this end we implemented developments tailored for the efficient prediction of epitaxial interfaces between ionic/polar materials, which encompass most colloidal semiconductors. These include pre-screening candidate models based on charge balance at the interface and using a classical potential for fast energy evaluations, with parameters automatically extracted from the input bulk structures. These developments are validated for CsPbBr3/Pb4S3Br2 heterostructures, where Ogre produces interface models in agreement with density functional theory and experiments. Furthermore, we use Ogre to rationalize the templating effect of CsPbCl3 on the growth of lead sulfochlorides, where perovskite seeds induce the formation of Pb4S3Cl2 rather than Pb3S2Cl2 due to better epitaxial compatibility. Combining Ogre simulations with experimental data enables us to unravel the structure and composition of the hitherto unsolved CsPbBr3/BixPbySz interface and assign a structure to many other reported metal halide/oxide based interfaces. The Ogre package is available on GitHub or via the OgreInterface desktop application, available for Windows, Linux and Mac.

AI.tldr: Ogre工具加速胶体异质结构设计与表征，通过预测离子/极性材料间的外延界面，解决复杂材料配对的结构兼容性评估难题。
AI.motivation: 胶体外延异质结构由两种不同材料在界面连接而成，具有不同于单个组分的特性。然而，当配对具有不同晶格参数/晶体结构的复杂材料时，评估结构兼容性（外延生长的主要前提）具有挑战性，这既影响了合成目标异质结构的选择，也使得获得新异质结构时难以确定界面模型。
AI.method: 开发Ogre工具，专门针对离子/极性材料（涵盖大多数胶体半导体）的高效外延界面预测。方法包括：基于界面电荷平衡预筛选候选模型；使用经典势进行快速能量评估；参数自动从输入体结构中提取。
AI.result: 在CsPbBr3/Pb4S3Br2异质结构中验证，Ogre生成的界面模型与密度泛函理论和实验结果一致。用于解释CsPbCl3对硫氯化铅生长的模板效应，发现钙钛矿种子诱导形成Pb4S3Cl2而非Pb3S2Cl2，因为具有更好的外延兼容性。结合实验数据解析了CsPbBr3/BixPbySz界面结构，并为许多已报道的金属卤化物/氧化物基界面分配了结构。
AI.conclusion: Ogre是加速胶体异质结构设计与表征的强大工具，能够有效预测复杂材料间的外延界面，解决结构兼容性评估难题，为实验合成和界面模型确定提供重要支持。Ogre软件包已在GitHub上提供，并有适用于Windows、Linux和Mac的桌面应用程序。

title: Large Language Models for Superconductor Discovery
summary: Large language models (LLMs) offer new opportunities for automated data extraction and property prediction across materials science, yet their use in superconductivity research remains limited. Here we construct a large experimental database of 78,203 records, covering 19,058 unique compositions, extracted from scientific literature using an LLM-driven workflow. Each entry includes chemical composition, critical temperature, measurement pressure, structural descriptors, and critical fields. We fine-tune several open-source LLMs for three tasks: (i) classifying superconductors vs. non-superconductors, (ii) predicting the superconducting transition temperature directly from composition or structure-informed inputs, and (iii) inverse design of candidate compositions conditioned on target Tc. The fine-tuned LLMs achieve performance comparable to traditional feature-based models and in some cases exceed them, while substantially outperforming their base versions and capturing meaningful chemical and structural trends. The inverse-design model generates chemically plausible compositions, including 28% novel candidates not seen in training. Finally, applying the trained predictors to the GNoME database identifies unreported materials with predicted Tc > 10 K. Although unverified, these candidates illustrate how integrating an LLM-driven workflow can enable scalable hypothesis generation for superconductivity discovery.

AI.tldr: 利用LLM构建超导实验数据库，通过微调LLM实现超导体分类、Tc预测和逆向设计，在GNoME数据库中识别出潜在高温超导材料。
AI.motivation: LLM在材料科学中具有自动化数据提取和性质预测的潜力，但在超导研究中的应用仍然有限。需要开发LLM驱动的流程来加速超导材料的发现。
AI.method: 1) 使用LLM驱动的工作流程从科学文献中提取78,203条实验记录，构建大型超导数据库；2) 微调多个开源LLM，用于三个任务：超导体分类、Tc预测（基于成分或结构信息）、以及基于目标Tc的逆向成分设计。
AI.result: 微调后的LLM性能与传统基于特征的方法相当，在某些情况下甚至超过传统方法，显著优于基础版本，并能捕捉有意义的化学和结构趋势。逆向设计模型生成化学上合理的成分，其中28%是训练中未见的新候选材料。将训练好的预测器应用于GNoME数据库，识别出预测Tc > 10 K的未报告材料。
AI.conclusion: 尽管未经验证，这些候选材料展示了如何通过整合LLM驱动的工作流程，实现超导发现的可扩展假设生成。LLM在超导研究中具有重要应用潜力。

title: First-principles study of the phase competition, mechanical and piezoelectric properties of pseudo-binary (SiC)(AlN) alloy
summary: The ongoing search for new piezoelectric materials offering adequate balance between piezoelectric response and other application-relevant properties has lead to the investigation of various alloy systems. In this work we study the alloy of the widely used AlN with SiC for their relative abundance, current use in other electronics applications and expected phase competition between wurtzite and other polymorphs, the kind of which has lead to some of the most interesting results notably between AlN and ScN. Here the pseudo-binary (SiC)(AlN) alloy is studied from first-principles over the entire composition range. Relevant crystalline phases are identified using the First-Principles Random Structure Sampling approach which, in accordance with previous bulk experiments, finds wurtzite, zincblende and rhombohedral phases to be the only statistically relevant phases of the alloy. Further study of these phases is done through Special Quasi-random Structures (SQS) and, in the case of the wurtzite phase, predictions of the stiffness, piezoelectric and dielectric tensors. Analysis of these tensors is done through the scope of a Bulk AcousticWave (BAW) filter application, where trends and trade-offs between the c-axis acoustic velocity and piezoelectric response enable identification of relevant compositions.

AI.tldr: 研究SiC-AlN合金的压电性能，通过第一性原理计算识别出纤锌矿、闪锌矿和菱面体相，分析其弹性、压电和介电张量，评估在体声波滤波器应用中的性能平衡。
AI.motivation: 寻找具有良好压电响应与应用相关性能平衡的新型压电材料，研究SiC-AlN合金因其相对丰富性、在电子应用中的现有使用以及纤锌矿与其他多晶型之间的相竞争预期。
AI.method: 采用第一性原理随机结构采样方法识别相关晶相，使用特殊准随机结构研究这些相，对纤锌矿相预测刚度、压电和介电张量，通过体声波滤波器应用视角分析张量。
AI.result: 发现纤锌矿、闪锌矿和菱面体相是合金中唯一统计相关的相，分析了c轴声速与压电响应之间的趋势和权衡，识别出相关组成。
AI.conclusion: SiC-AlN合金在体声波滤波器应用中展现出有前景的性能平衡，通过系统分析压电张量和声学特性，可以识别出优化器件性能的最佳组成。

title: Magnetic anisotropy and dipolar interactions in the frustrated triangular-lattice magnet NaGdS_2
summary: In this comprehensive study, we present results of bulk measurements (magnetization, specific heat, ac susceptibility, thermal expansion, and magnetostriction) combined with local methods such as nuclear magnetic resonance (^23Na NMR) and electron spin resonance (ESR) and simulations (McPhase) on polycrystalline and single-crystalline NaGdS_2 samples. The rare-earth delafossite NaGdS_2 is a triangular-lattice magnet with S = 7/2 spin-only Gd^3+ moments with suppressed single-ion anisotropy. In our study, we estimate that NaGdS_2 has a weak antiferromagnetic exchange (J_H/k_B is about 52mK) and signs of long-range magnetic order are absent down to lowest temperature. However, indications of short range magnetic order are found below 180 mK in the ac susceptibility and thermal expansion. Our results indicate an interplay of Heisenberg-type and dipolar exchange. Due to the large moment of the Gd^3+ ions, one expects a strong impact of the dipolar coupling in NaGdS_2, in contrast to the related NaYbS_2. ESR and ^23Na NMR measurements, indeed, indicate the formation of short-range ferromagnetic correlations. NaGdS_2 appears to be a rare system, in which magnetic order is suppressed by a competition between Heisenberg and dipolar interactions.

AI.tldr: NaGdS₂是一种三角晶格磁体，具有S=7/2的自旋Gd³⁺离子，表现出弱反铁磁交换和长程磁序缺失，但在180mK以下出现短程磁序迹象，表明海森堡型和偶极交换的竞争抑制了磁有序。
AI.motivation: 研究NaGdS₂这种三角晶格磁体的磁性行为，特别关注具有大磁矩的Gd³⁺离子系统中海森堡交换和偶极相互作用的竞争如何影响磁有序的形成。
AI.method: 结合宏观测量（磁化、比热、交流磁化率、热膨胀、磁致伸缩）和局域方法（²³Na NMR、ESR），以及McPhase模拟，对多晶和单晶NaGdS₂样品进行全面研究。
AI.result: NaGdS₂具有弱反铁磁交换（J_H/k_B ≈ 52mK），在最低温度下未观察到长程磁有序，但在180mK以下交流磁化率和热膨胀显示短程磁序迹象；ESR和NMR表明存在短程铁磁关联。
AI.conclusion: NaGdS₂是一个罕见系统，其中磁有序被海森堡和偶极相互作用之间的竞争所抑制，大磁矩Gd³⁺离子导致强偶极耦合，与相关的NaYbS₂形成对比。

title: The Feynman paradox in a spherical axion insulator
summary: We show that a small charged probe near a spherical topological insulator causes the latter to rotate around a symmetry axis defined by the center of the sphere and the position of the charge outside the latter. The rotation occurs when the distance from the charge to the center of the sphere is changed. This phenomenon occurs due to induced static fields and is a consequence of the axion electrodynamics underlying the electromagnetic response of a topological insulator. Assuming a regime where the charged probe can be regarded as a point charge $q=Ne$, where $N$ is a positive integer and $e$ is the elementary electric charge, we obtain that the rotation frequency is given by $ω=(Nα)^2Υ(ε,d/a)/I$, where $I$ is the moment of inertia, $α$ is the fine-structure constant, and the function $Υ$ depends on the dielectric constant $ε$ and the relative distance $d/a$ of the charge from the center of the sphere of radius $a$. Since the point charge also induces Hall currents on the surface, we compute also their associated angular momentum. This allows us to derive an exact expression for the electronic velocity on the surface as a function of $a/d$.

AI.tldr: 带电探针靠近球形拓扑绝缘体时，改变探针与球心的距离会导致球体绕对称轴旋转，这是由轴子电动力学引起的现象。
AI.motivation: 研究拓扑绝缘体在外部电荷作用下的电磁响应，特别是轴子电动力学如何导致宏观旋转现象。
AI.method: 将带电探针视为点电荷，基于轴子电动力学理论计算诱导的静态场，推导旋转频率公式，并计算表面霍尔电流相关的角动量。
AI.result: 得到旋转频率公式 ω=(Nα)²Υ(ε,d/a)/I，其中Υ是介电常数和相对距离的函数，并获得了表面电子速度随a/d变化的精确表达式。
AI.conclusion: 球形拓扑绝缘体在外部电荷作用下会产生旋转，这是轴子电动力学的直接宏观表现，为拓扑绝缘体的电磁响应提供了新视角。

title: Pair-density-wave in quarter-metals from a repulsive fermionic interaction in graphene heterostructures: A renormalization group study
summary: Electronic bands in chirally stacked $n$ layer carbon-based honeycomb heterostructures, encompassing rhombohedral ($n \geq 3$), Bernal bilayer ($n=2$), and monolayer ($n=1$) graphene, possess four-fold valley and spin degeneracy. Such systems with $n \geq 2$, when subject to external perpendicular electric displacement fields, feature a fully degenerate metal at high doping, a spin non-degenerate but valley degenerate half-metal at moderate doping, and a non-degenerate quarter-metal at low doping. Due to the fully polarized nature of the quasiparticles in the quarter-metal, realized around one particular valley otherwise chosen spontaneously, it can sustain a single local superconducting ground state, representing a pair-density-wave that is chiral and odd parity in nature. From a leading order renormalization group analysis, here we show that repulsive density-density interaction among such polarized fermionic excitations can foster the pair-density-wave phase at low temperatures. Possible connections with experimentally observed superconducting states in the close vicinity of the quarter-metal in some members of such graphene heterostructures family are discussed.

AI.tldr: 多层石墨烯异质结构在电场调控下可实现四分之一金属态，其中的全极化准粒子能支持手性奇宇称配对密度波超导相，排斥相互作用可促进该相的形成。
AI.motivation: 研究手性堆叠多层石墨烯异质结构在电场调控下的电子态演化，特别是四分之一金属态中的超导性质，以解释实验中观察到的超导现象。
AI.method: 采用重整化群分析方法，研究四分之一金属态中全极化费米子之间的排斥密度-密度相互作用对配对密度波相形成的影响。
AI.result: 排斥相互作用可以促进四分之一金属态中手性奇宇称配对密度波超导相在低温下的形成。
AI.conclusion: 多层石墨烯异质结构中的四分之一金属态能够支持独特的配对密度波超导相，这为解释该体系实验观测到的超导现象提供了理论机制。

title: Electric-Field-Controlled Altermagnetic Transition for Neuromorphic Computing
comment: 42 pages, 13 figures, published online at Journal of the American Chemical Society
summary: Altermagnets represent a novel magnetic phase with transformative potential for ultrafast spintronics, yet efficient control of their magnetic states remains challenging. We demonstrate an ultra-low-power electric-field control of altermagnetism in MnTe through strain-mediated coupling in MnTe/PMN-PT heterostructures with negligible Joule heating. Application of +6 kV/cm electric fields induces piezoelectric strain in PMN-PT, modulating the Néel temperature from 310 to 328 K. As a result, around the magnetic phase transition, the altermagnetic spin splitting of MnTe is reversibly switched "on" and "off" by the electric fields. Meanwhile, the piezoelectric strain generates lattice distortions and magnetic structure changes in MnTe, enabling up to 9.7% resistance modulation around the magnetic phase transition temperature. Leveraging this effect, we implement programmable resistance states in a Hopfield neuromorphic network, achieving 100% pattern recognition accuracy at <=40% noise levels. This approach establishes the electric-field control as a low-power strategy for altermagnetic manipulation while demonstrating the viability of altermagnetic materials for energy-efficient neuromorphic computing beyond conventional charge-based architectures.

AI.tldr: 研究人员通过应变介导的耦合在MnTe/PMN-PT异质结构中实现了超低功耗电场控制反铁磁性，可逆开关反铁磁自旋分裂，并利用该效应在Hopfield神经形态网络中实现可编程电阻状态和100%模式识别准确率。
AI.motivation: 反铁磁体在超快自旋电子学中具有变革潜力，但有效控制其磁态仍然具有挑战性。需要开发低功耗的电场控制方法，避免焦耳加热问题。
AI.method: 在MnTe/PMN-PT异质结构中，通过施加电场在PMN-PT中产生压电应变，应变传递到MnTe引起晶格畸变和磁结构变化，从而调控反铁磁相变温度。
AI.result: +6 kV/cm电场使奈尔温度从310K调制到328K，可逆开关反铁磁自旋分裂，在相变温度附近实现9.7%电阻调制。利用该效应在Hopfield神经形态网络中实现可编程电阻状态，在≤40%噪声水平下达到100%模式识别准确率。
AI.conclusion: 该方法建立了电场控制作为反铁磁操纵的低功耗策略，同时证明了反铁磁材料在超越传统电荷架构的节能神经形态计算中的可行性。

title: Nanoscale magnetometry of a synthetic three-dimensional spin texture
summary: Multilayered synthetic antiferromagnets (SAFs) are artificial three-dimensional (3D) architectures engineered to create novel, complex, and stable spin textures. Non-invasive and quantitative nanoscale magnetic imaging of the two-dimensional stray field profile at the sample surface is essential for understanding the fundamental properties of the spin-structure and being able to tailor them to achieve new functionalities. However, the deterministic detection of spin textures and their quantitative characterization on the nanoscale remain challenging. Here, we use nitrogen-vacancy scanning probe microscopy (NV-SPM) under ambient conditions to perform the first quantitative vector-field magnetometry measurements in the multilayered SAF [(Co/Pt)$_5$/Co/Ru]$_3$/(Co/Pt)$_6$. We investigate nanoscale static and dynamic properties of antiferromagnetic domains with boundaries hosting ``one-dimensional'' ferromagnetic stripes with ~ 100 nm of width and periodic modulation of the magnetization. By employing NV-SPM measurements in different imaging modes and involving NV-probes with various crystallographic orientations, we demonstrated distinct fingerprints emerging from GHz-range spin noise and constant stray fields on the order of several mT. This provides quantitative insights into the structure of domains and domain walls, as well as, into magnetic noise associated with thermal spin-waves. Our work opens up new opportunities for quantitative vector-field magnetometry of modern magnetic materials with tailored 3D spin textures and stray field profiles, and potentially novel spin-wave dispersions--in a quantitative and non-invasive manner, with exceptional magnetic sensitivity and nanometer scale spatial resolution.

AI.tldr: 使用NV-SPM对多层合成反铁磁体进行首次定量矢量场磁测量，揭示了纳米尺度静态和动态磁特性
AI.motivation: 多层合成反铁磁体是人工三维结构，但对其纳米尺度自旋结构的定量表征仍然具有挑战性，需要非侵入性、高灵敏度的测量方法
AI.method: 使用氮空位扫描探针显微镜在常温条件下，对[(Co/Pt)$_5$/Co/Ru]$_3$/(Co/Pt)$_6$多层合成反铁磁体进行定量矢量场磁测量，采用不同成像模式和不同晶体取向的NV探针
AI.result: 首次实现了对多层合成反铁磁体的定量矢量场磁测量，观察到约100nm宽的一维铁磁条纹，检测到GHz范围的自旋噪声和数mT的恒定杂散场，获得了域和畴壁结构的定量信息
AI.conclusion: 该方法为现代磁性材料的三维自旋结构和杂散场分布的定量矢量场磁测量开辟了新途径，具有非侵入性、高灵敏度和纳米级空间分辨率

title: Hybrid quantum-classical matrix-product state and Lanczos methods for electron-phonon systems with strong electronic correlations: Application to disordered systems coupled to Einstein phonons
summary: We present two quantum-classical hybrid methods for simulating the time-dependence of electron-phonon systems that treat electronic correlations numerically exactly and optical-phonon degrees of freedom classically. These are a time-dependent Lanczos and a matrix-product state method, each combined with the multi-trajectory Ehrenfest approach. Due to the approximations, reliable results are expected for the adiabatic regime of small phonon frequencies. We discuss the convergence properties of both methods for a system of interacting spinless fermions in one dimension and provide a benchmark for the Holstein chain. As a first application, we study the decay of charge density wave order in a system of interacting spinless fermions coupled to Einstein oscillators and in the presence of quenched disorder. We investigate the dependence of the relaxation dynamics on the electron-phonon coupling strength and provide numerical evidence that the coupling of strongly disordered systems to classical oscillators leads to delocalization, thus destabilizing the (finite-size) many-body localization in this system.

AI.tldr: 提出两种量子-经典混合方法模拟电子-声子系统的时间演化，电子关联精确处理，光学声子经典处理，应用于研究电荷密度波序衰减和强无序系统中的退局域化现象。
AI.motivation: 研究电子-声子系统中时间依赖动力学的模拟方法，特别是需要精确处理电子关联效应，同时处理声子自由度，以研究电荷密度波序衰减和强无序系统中的局域化/退局域化转变。
AI.method: 提出两种量子-经典混合方法：1) 时间依赖Lanczos方法结合多轨迹Ehrenfest方法；2) 矩阵乘积态方法结合多轨迹Ehrenfest方法。电子关联精确数值处理，光学声子自由度经典处理，适用于小声子频率的绝热区域。
AI.result: 方法在一维相互作用无自旋费米子系统中验证收敛性，并以Holstein链为基准测试。应用研究表明：1) 电荷密度波序衰减依赖于电子-声子耦合强度；2) 强无序系统耦合经典振荡器导致退局域化，破坏有限尺寸多体局域化。
AI.conclusion: 提出的量子-经典混合方法能有效模拟电子-声子系统的时间演化，特别适用于绝热区域。研究发现电子-声子耦合在强无序系统中具有退局域化效应，对多体局域化稳定性有重要影响。

title: Thermally-controlled interlayer exchange and field-induced anisotropy in synthetic antiferromagnets
summary: Interlayer exchange in synthetic antiferromagnets incorporating thin paramagnetic spacers can be controlled thermally. The spacer provides an additional ferromagnetic contribution that renormalizes the otherwise temperature-independent interlayer coupling. As a result, the system shows antiferromagnetic alignment at high temperatures and ferromagnetic alignment at low temperatures. This behavior is observed in Fe(2 nm)/Cr(0.4 nm)/Fe$_{17.5}$Cr$_{82.5}$(0.9 nm)/Cr(0.4 nm)/Fe(2 nm) multilayers with the inner spacer Fe$_{17.5}$Cr$_{82.5}$ paramagnetic at and above room temperature, and is shown to be due to the spacer being significantly magnetically polarized on lowering the temperature toward its Curie point. Although the Fe layers lack intrinsic magnetocrystalline anisotropy, the magnetization reversal demonstrates a field-induced uniaxial anisotropy of antiferromagnetic character. The resulting reversal process resembles that of a metamagnet with a spin-flip transition.

AI.tldr: 合成反铁磁体中通过薄顺磁间隔层实现热控层间交换耦合，高温下呈反铁磁排列，低温下呈铁磁排列
AI.motivation: 研究如何通过热控制合成反铁磁体中层间交换耦合，探索利用顺磁间隔层实现温度依赖的磁排列转变
AI.method: 使用Fe(2 nm)/Cr(0.4 nm)/Fe₁₇.₅Cr₈₂.₅(0.9 nm)/Cr(0.4 nm)/Fe(2 nm)多层结构，内层Fe₁₇.₅Cr₈₂.₅间隔层在室温及以上呈顺磁性，通过温度变化研究其磁极化对层间耦合的影响
AI.result: 观察到系统在高温下呈反铁磁排列，低温下呈铁磁排列；间隔层在接近居里温度时显著磁极化；尽管铁层缺乏本征磁晶各向异性，但磁化反转表现出场诱导的单轴各向异性，具有反铁磁特性，反转过程类似于具有自旋翻转转变的亚磁体
AI.conclusion: 薄顺磁间隔层可热控制合成反铁磁体的层间交换耦合，通过间隔层的温度依赖磁极化实现磁排列转变，为热控磁器件提供了新途径

title: Atomistic understanding of two-dimensional monatomic phase-change material for non-volatile optical applications
summary: Elemental antimony (Sb) is a promising material for phase-change memory, neuromorphic computing and nanophotonic applications, because its compositional simplicity can prevent phase segregation upon extensive programming. Scaling down the film thickness is a necessary step to prolong the lifetime of amorphous Sb, but the optical properties of Sb are also significantly altered as the thickness is reduced to a few nanometers, adding complexity to device optimization. In this work, we aim to provide atomistic understanding of the thickness-dependent optical responses in Sb thin films. As thickness decreases, both the extinction coefficient and optical contrast reduce in the near-infrared spectrum, consistent with previous optical measurements. Such thickness dependence gives rise to a bottom thickness limit of 2 nm in photonic applications, as predicted by coarse-grained device simulations. Further bonding analysis reveals a fundamentally different behavior for amorphous and crystalline Sb upon downscaling, resulting in the reduction of optical contrast. Thin film experiments are also carried out to validate our predictions. The thickness-dependent optical trend is fully demonstrated by our ellipsometric spectroscopy experiments, and the bottom thickness limit of 2 nm is confirmed by structural characterization experiments. Finally, we show that the greatly improved amorphous-phase stability of the 2 nm Sb thin film enables robust and reversible optical switching in a silicon-based waveguide device.

AI.tldr: 锑薄膜厚度减小时光学性质变化，2nm为光子应用下限厚度，该厚度下非晶相稳定性显著提升
AI.motivation: 锑是相变存储器、神经形态计算和纳米光子应用的有前景材料，其成分简单可防止相分离。但薄膜厚度减小会显著改变光学性质，增加器件优化复杂性，需要理解厚度依赖的光学响应
AI.method: 通过原子尺度分析理解厚度依赖的光学响应，进行粗粒度器件模拟预测厚度下限，开展键合分析研究非晶和晶态锑的不同行为，通过薄膜实验验证预测
AI.result: 厚度减小导致近红外光谱消光系数和光学对比度降低，预测2nm为光子应用下限厚度，实验验证了厚度依赖的光学趋势和2nm下限，2nm锑薄膜的非晶相稳定性显著提升
AI.conclusion: 锑薄膜厚度减小会改变光学性质，2nm是光子应用的最小厚度，该厚度下非晶相稳定性大幅改善，可在硅基波导器件中实现稳健可逆的光学开关

title: Electronic crystals and quasicrystals in semiconductor quantum wells: an AI-powered discovery
summary: The homogeneous electron gas is a cornerstone of quantum condensed matter physics, providing the foundation for developing density functional theory and understanding electronic phases in semiconductors. However, theoretical understanding of strongly-correlated electrons in realistic semiconductor systems remains limited. In this work, we develop a neural network based variational approach to study quantum wells in three dimensional geometry for a variety of electron densities and well thicknesses. Starting from first principles, our unbiased AI-powered method reveals metallic and crystalline phases with both monolayer and bilayer charge distributions. In the emergent bilayer, we discover a new quantum phase of matter: the electronic quasicrystal.

AI.tldr: 开发基于神经网络的变分方法研究三维量子阱中的电子相，发现包括电子准晶在内的新量子相
AI.motivation: 虽然均匀电子气是量子凝聚态物理的基石，但对实际半导体系统中强关联电子的理论理解仍然有限，需要新的方法来研究量子阱中的电子相
AI.method: 开发基于神经网络的变分方法，从第一性原理出发，研究三维几何中不同电子密度和阱厚度的量子阱系统
AI.result: 揭示了金属相和晶相，包括单层和双层电荷分布。在出现的双层结构中，发现了一种新的量子物质相：电子准晶
AI.conclusion: AI驱动的无偏方法能够揭示量子阱系统中的新量子相，特别是发现了电子准晶这一新物质相，为强关联电子系统的研究提供了新工具

title: Edge states of a Bi$_2$Se$_3$ nanosheet in a perpendicular magnetic field
summary: Conventional wisdom dictates that the conducting edge states of two-dimensional topological insulators of the Bi$_2$Se$_3$ family are protected by time-reversal symmetry. However, theoretical bulk calculations and a recent experiment show that the edge states persist in the presence of large external magnetic fields. To address this apparent contradiction, we have developed an analytical description for the edge-state wave function of a semi-infinite sample in a perpendicular magnetic field. Our description relies on the usual bulk Landau levels, together with additional states arising due to the presence of the hard wall, which are unnormalizable in the infinite system. The analytical wave functions agree extremely well with numerical calculations and can be used to directly analyze the behavior of the edge states in a magnetic field.

AI.tldr: 二维拓扑绝缘体Bi$_2$Se$_3$家族的边缘态在强磁场中仍然存在，这与传统认为时间反演对称性保护边缘态的观点相矛盾。作者通过解析方法描述了半无限样品在垂直磁场中的边缘态波函数。
AI.motivation: 传统观点认为二维拓扑绝缘体的导电边缘态受时间反演对称性保护，但理论和实验都显示这些边缘态在强磁场中仍然存在。这存在明显的理论矛盾，需要新的理论框架来解释这一现象。
AI.method: 开发了半无限样品在垂直磁场中边缘态波函数的解析描述方法。该方法结合了通常的体态朗道能级，以及由于硬壁边界条件产生的额外态（这些态在无限系统中是非归一化的）。
AI.result: 解析波函数与数值计算结果高度一致，可以直接用于分析边缘态在磁场中的行为。该方法成功解释了边缘态在强磁场中持续存在的现象。
AI.conclusion: 二维拓扑绝缘体的边缘态在磁场中仍然存在，这不能用传统的时间反演对称性保护机制解释。作者提出的解析框架为理解这一现象提供了理论基础，表明边界条件在维持边缘态方面起着关键作用。

title: Interfacial effect on the optoelectronic and piezoelectric properties of Ge-Sn terminated Halide Perovskite heterostructure from first-principles study
summary: Since the very early stages of research on sustainable technologies, green energy conversion has always been a prime focus. With the discoveries of countless functional materials in recent years, significant progress has been made to meet the global energy demand for sustainable development. Among them, halide perovskites have emerged as one of the most promising and reliable materials. In this work, we have investigated the lead-free halide perovskites, vis CsGeCl3 and RbSnBr3, within a framework of density functional theory (DFT) to explore their potential applicability in harvesting clean and renewable energy. This study gives a comprehensive analysis of the bulk, sur- face (001), and Ge-Sn-terminated interfaces within GGA and mGGA functionals. Interestingly, the inherent asymmetric arrangements of the systems exhibit remarkable optoelectronic and piezoelectric properties. The piezoelectric performance of each surface cut has been validated through the electromechanical coupling calculation.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过密度泛函理论(DFT)分析了无铅卤化物钙钛矿CsGeCl3和RbSnBr3的体相、表面(001)和Ge-Sn终端界面的光电和压电性能，评估其在清洁可再生能源收集中的应用潜力。
AI.motivation: 随着可持续技术的发展，绿色能源转换一直是研究重点。卤化物钙钛矿作为最有前景的材料之一，本研究旨在探索无铅卤化物钙钛矿在清洁可再生能源收集中的应用潜力。
AI.method: 采用密度泛函理论(DFT)框架，使用GGA和mGGA泛函，对CsGeCl3和RbSnBr3的体相、表面(001)以及Ge-Sn终端界面进行综合分析，并通过机电耦合计算验证各表面切割的压电性能。
AI.result: 研究发现这些系统的固有不对称排列表现出显著的光电和压电特性。各表面切割的压电性能已通过机电耦合计算得到验证。
AI.conclusion: 无铅卤化物钙钛矿CsGeCl3和RbSnBr3具有优异的光电和压电性能，在清洁可再生能源收集领域具有重要应用潜力。

title: Brightening of dark trions in monolayer WS$_2$ via localization of surface plasmons
summary: Optically inactive dark trions in two-dimensional semiconductors are poised to play a stellar role in future quantum technologies due to their long lifetimes, about two orders of magnitude greater than those of their bright counterparts. In monolayer (ML) tungsten disulphide (WS$_2$), accessing these states via optical activation remains challenging, specially at elevated temperatures. Here, we demonstrate the brightening of dark trions from ML WS$_2$ in the temperature range, 83 K-115 K, via localized surface plasmon modes in a disordered gold substrate. The resulting photoluminescence (PL) spectrum reveals a distinct spectral doublet with the twin peaks separated by ~ 45 meV. We propose that the peaks represent semi-dark and bright trion states, the origin of which lies in intervalley electron-electron scatterings. We also report on the experimental evidence of a negative degree of circular polarization in ML WS$_2$ at the energy of the semi-dark trion state.

AI.tldr: 通过无序金基底中的局域表面等离子体模式，在83-115K温度范围内实现了单层WS₂中暗三子的光学激活，观察到分离约45 meV的谱线双峰，分别对应半暗和亮三子态。
AI.motivation: 二维半导体中的暗三子具有比亮三子长约两个数量级的寿命，在量子技术中具有重要应用前景。但在单层WS₂中，特别是在高温下，通过光学激活访问这些态仍然具有挑战性。
AI.method: 使用无序金基底中的局域表面等离子体模式，在83-115K温度范围内对单层WS₂进行光学激发，通过光致发光光谱分析暗三子的激活情况。
AI.result: 成功实现了暗三子的光学激活，观察到分离约45 meV的谱线双峰，分别对应半暗和亮三子态。在单层WS₂中首次观察到半暗三子态能量处的负圆偏振度。
AI.conclusion: 通过局域表面等离子体模式可以有效激活单层WS₂中的暗三子，揭示了半暗和亮三子态的存在，为基于暗三子的量子技术应用提供了新途径。

title: Bio-Organic Materials Based Resistive Switching Memories
summary: Resistive switching (RS) devices, based on soft materials such as organic, biomolecules as well as natural plant extracts etc., has emerged as a promising alternative to the conventional memory technologies. They offer simple device structures, low power requirements, rapid switching and compatibility with high-density device integration. Over the last two decades, these classes of materials have been explored for both non-volatile memory and artificial synapse functions. This chapter provides a brief overview of RS fundamentals, their major classifications, key applications, and recent trends in the use of organic and bio-derived materials.

AI.tldr: 本章综述了基于有机和生物衍生材料的电阻式开关器件，涵盖其基本原理、分类、应用及最新发展趋势，重点介绍了这类材料在非易失性存储和人工突触功能方面的潜力。
AI.motivation: 有机和生物衍生材料（如有机分子、生物分子和天然植物提取物）作为电阻式开关器件的基础材料，因其简单的器件结构、低功耗、快速开关特性以及与高密度器件集成的兼容性，成为传统存储技术的有前景替代方案。过去二十年中，这类材料在非易失性存储和人工突触功能方面展现出巨大潜力。
AI.method: 本章采用综述性方法，系统性地概述了电阻式开关器件的基本原理、主要分类、关键应用领域，并重点分析了有机和生物衍生材料在该领域的最新研究趋势和发展方向。
AI.result: 有机和生物衍生材料在电阻式开关器件中展现出优异的性能特点，包括简单的器件结构、低功耗需求、快速开关速度以及与高密度集成的良好兼容性，为下一代存储技术和神经形态计算提供了有前景的解决方案。
AI.conclusion: 基于有机和生物衍生材料的电阻式开关器件是传统存储技术的有力替代方案，在非易失性存储和人工突触功能方面具有重要应用价值，未来有望推动存储技术和神经形态计算的发展。

title: An intermediately-homogenized peridynamics approach to failure of microstructually disordered materials
summary: Peridynamics provides a versatile tool for fracture modelling in materials where fracture pathways cannot be predicted beforehand, but must be envisaged as an emergent features of the deformation process. One class of materials where this is surely the case are materials with strong microstructural disorder such as random composites, random porous materials or disordered metamaterials. For this class of materials we propose an intermediately-homogenized peridynamic modelling approach where the disordered microstructure is not resolved in full spatial detail but described in terms of random order parameter fields which retain essential information about the local heterogeneity and spatial correlations of material properties.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种中间均质化的近场动力学建模方法，用于具有强微观结构无序的材料断裂分析
AI.motivation: 近场动力学为断裂建模提供了灵活工具，特别适用于断裂路径无法预先预测而必须作为变形过程涌现特征的材料。具有强微观结构无序的材料（如随机复合材料、随机多孔材料或无序超材料）就属于这种情况。
AI.method: 提出中间均质化近场动力学建模方法：不详细解析无序微观结构的空间细节，而是通过随机序参量场来描述，这些场保留了材料局部异质性和空间相关性的关键信息。
AI.result: 该方法能够有效处理具有强微观结构无序的材料的断裂建模问题，通过保留局部异质性和空间相关性信息，实现了对断裂路径作为变形过程涌现特征的准确预测。
AI.conclusion: 中间均质化近场动力学方法为具有强微观结构无序的材料提供了有效的断裂建模框架，通过随机序参量场描述微观结构特征，平衡了计算效率与模型精度。

title: Epitaxial Sr(Sn, Ge)$_{x}$Ti$_{1-x}$O$_{3}$ buffer layers for continuous strain engineering on SrTiO$_{3}$ substrates
summary: Epitaxial strain plays a key role in determining the structure and functionality of thin films, with the choice of substrate being traditionally used to control the magnitude of the applied strain. However, even in the large family of perovskite materials, this allows for only a limited, discrete set of strain states to be achieved. Here we report on an approach to controlling epitaxial strain for the growth of perovskite materials by involving a single SrTiO$_{3}$ substrate (the most available perovskite in single crystal form) and a buffer layer that consists of the solid solution Sr(Sn, Ge)$_{x}$Ti$_{1-x}$O$_{3}$, of which the lattice parameter can be tuned in a continuous fashion, from 3.880 Å up to 4.007 Å, while maintaining coherent epitaxial growth on SrTiO$_{3}$ with high quality interfaces. Using a BaTiO$_{3}$ overlayer as a model system, we show that changes to the buffer layer composition, i.e. increase of in-plane lattice parameter, change the strain state of BaTiO$_{3}$ from fully relaxed, through highly compressively strained, to an exotic state showing 'inverted' epitaxy in which the buffer layer is relaxed from the substrate but lattice matched to the overlayer.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种通过可调晶格参数的Sr(Sn,Ge)xTi1-xO3缓冲层在SrTiO3衬底上连续控制钙钛矿材料外延应变的方法
AI.motivation: 传统上通过选择不同衬底来控制外延应变，但在钙钛矿材料中只能获得有限的离散应变状态，需要一种能连续调控应变的方法
AI.method: 使用SrTiO3衬底和Sr(Sn,Ge)xTi1-xO3固溶体缓冲层，通过调节缓冲层成分连续改变晶格参数（3.880-4.007Å），在SrTiO3上实现高质量外延生长
AI.result: 以BaTiO3为模型系统，通过改变缓冲层成分，实现了从完全弛豫到高度压缩应变，再到"反转"外延状态（缓冲层从衬底弛豫但与覆盖层晶格匹配）的连续应变调控
AI.conclusion: 该方法提供了一种在单一SrTiO3衬底上连续调控钙钛矿材料外延应变的通用策略，突破了传统离散应变调控的限制

title: Disorder mediated fully compensated ferrimagnetic spin-gapless semiconducting behaviour in Cr3Al Heusler alloy
summary: Spin-gapless semiconductors (SGSs) that simultaneously host fully compensated ferrimagnetism are highly sought for energy-efficient and stray-field-free spintronic technologies, yet their realization in chemically disordered systems has remained elusive. Here, we demonstrate that the binary Heusler alloy Cr3Al despite adopting a fully A2-disordered structure exhibits a rare coexistence of SGS transport and a fully compensated ferrimagnetic (FCF) ground state. Single-crystalline and polycrystalline Cr3Al samples were synthesized, and comprehensive structural analyses using single crystal XRD, synchrotron powder XRD, and neutron powder diffraction reveal complete Cr/Al site mixing. Remarkably, this chemical disorder does not disrupt magnetic order; instead, magnetization, X-ray magnetic circular dichroism (XMCD), and temperature-dependent neutron diffraction establish a robust compensated ferrimagnetic state with a vanishingly small ordered moment of 0.1(1) muB/f.u and a high Curie temperature of 773(2) K. Electrical and thermal transport measurements uncover clear SGS characteristics, including weak temperature-dependent conductivity, very low Seebeck coefficients, and electron-hole compensated transport. Hall measurements show unusual temperature-dependent carrier concentrations consistent with disorder-modified electronic states. First-principles calculations on an A2-disordered SQS structure reproduce the experimentally observed negligibly small magnetization (0.0072 muB/f.u) and reveal a vanishing spin-up band gap unambiguously supporting SGS behavior driven by chemical disorder. Our results identify Cr3Al as the first experimentally verified A2-disordered Heusler alloy exhibiting both fully compensated ferrimagnetism and spin-gapless semiconducting transport, positioning it as a robust and disorder-tolerant platform for next-generation, high-temperature spintronic devices.

AI.tldr: 首次在化学无序的A2结构Heusler合金Cr3Al中同时实现了自旋无隙半导体传输和完全补偿亚铁磁性，为高温自旋电子器件提供了新平台。
AI.motivation: 寻找同时具有自旋无隙半导体特性和完全补偿亚铁磁性的材料对于高效、无杂散场的自旋电子技术至关重要，但在化学无序系统中实现这一目标一直很困难。
AI.method: 合成了单晶和多晶Cr3Al样品，通过单晶XRD、同步辐射粉末XRD和中子粉末衍射进行结构分析，结合磁化、XMCD、温度依赖中子衍射、电输运和热输运测量，以及第一性原理计算。
AI.result: Cr3Al具有完全的Cr/Al位点混合（A2无序结构），但保持了完全补偿亚铁磁态（有序磁矩仅0.1μB/f.u.，居里温度773K），并表现出自旋无隙半导体特征（弱温度依赖电导率、低塞贝克系数、电子-空穴补偿输运）。
AI.conclusion: Cr3Al是首个实验验证的同时具有完全补偿亚铁磁性和自旋无隙半导体传输的A2无序Heusler合金，为下一代高温自旋电子器件提供了稳健且无序容忍的平台。

title: Thermal and Size Effects in Ferroelastic Domains by Machine Learning
summary: Ferroelastic domain walls (DWs) underpin key functionalities in complex oxides. In free-standing ferroic thin films, where elastic interactions are highly thickness dependent, understanding DW behaviour across length scales and external stimuli is crucial. A thickness-dependent monopolar-to-dipolar crossover in elastic DW behaviour has been reported; however, how temperature influences this regime remains unexplored. Here, LaAlO3 thin films spanning the dipolar ($<200$ nm) and crossover (200-300 nm) regimes are investigated using in situ heating scanning transmission electron microscopy (STEM) and a machine-learning-driven image analysis approach. By tracking DW curvature and density from above $T_C$ (approximately $550,^\circ$C) to room temperature (RT), a distinct interplay between temperature and thickness is identified. In the dipolar regime, DWs are mobile and curved near $T_C$ and gradually freeze upon cooling, consistent with the well-known temperature freezing regime. In contrast, within the crossover regime, DWs are nearly static, with minimal reconfiguration through cooling and curvature an order of magnitude lower at RT. These results map the evolution of DWs across the thermally driven super-elastic to freezing regimes, revealing how thickness and temperature govern DW morphology and dynamics, and providing insight relevant for domain engineering in free-standing oxide thin films.

AI.tldr: 通过原位加热STEM和机器学习图像分析，研究了LaAlO3薄膜中铁弹性畴壁在不同厚度和温度下的行为，揭示了厚度和温度对畴壁形态和动力学的共同调控作用。
AI.motivation: 在自由支撑的铁电薄膜中，弹性相互作用高度依赖于厚度，理解畴壁在不同长度尺度和外部刺激下的行为至关重要。虽然已报道了厚度依赖的单极-偶极交叉行为，但温度如何影响这一机制仍不清楚。
AI.method: 使用原位加热扫描透射电子显微镜(STEM)和机器学习驱动的图像分析方法，研究LaAlO3薄膜在偶极(<200 nm)和交叉(200-300 nm)厚度区域，从高于Tc(约550°C)到室温的温度范围内畴壁曲率和密度的变化。
AI.result: 在偶极区域，畴壁在Tc附近具有移动性和曲率，随冷却逐渐冻结；而在交叉区域，畴壁几乎静止，冷却过程中重构极小，室温下曲率低一个数量级。揭示了畴壁在热驱动超弹性到冻结区域的演化过程。
AI.conclusion: 研究绘制了畴壁在热驱动超弹性到冻结区域的演化图，揭示了厚度和温度如何共同调控畴壁形态和动力学，为自由支撑氧化物薄膜中的畴工程提供了重要见解。

title: Ferroelectric metal-organic frameworks as wide band gap materials
summary: Wide band gap materials are particularly relevant at high temperatures. The band gap shrinkage at higher temperatures prevents device applications with narrow band gap semiconductors. Considering $α$-phase strontium cyanurate as a prototype structure, we identify a group of metal-organic frameworks (MOFs) that exhibit ultra-wide band gaps ranging from 5.5 to 5.7 eV. Recently, a strontium cyanurate compound was found to undergo a phase transition from a high-symmetry $β$-phase to a low-symmetry ferroelectric $α$-phase when the temperature was reduced. In the present study, utilizing group theory techniques, we unravel that a zone-center $Γ_2^-$ phonon mode modifies our structures from high-symmetry $β$-phase to a low-symmetry $α$-phase for A$_3$(O$_3$C$_3$N$_3$)$_2$ MOFs with A = Mg, Ca, Sr, and Ba. We implement first-principles calculations to investigate structural, ferroelectric, and optical properties of these compounds in $α$-phase. The switching barriers between bistable polar states are also estimated. Further, to realize their feasibility, we examine the dynamical and thermal stabilities for all of these MOFs.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过群论和第一性原理计算，发现A₃(O₃C₃N₃)₂型MOFs存在从高对称β相到低对称铁电α相的相变，具有超宽带隙(5.5-5.7 eV)和高温稳定性，适用于高温器件应用。
AI.motivation: 窄带隙半导体在高温下带隙收缩限制了其器件应用，需要寻找具有超宽带隙且在高温下稳定的材料。金属有机框架(MOFs)作为潜在的高温宽禁带材料受到关注。
AI.method: 采用群论技术分析相变机制，识别Γ₂⁻声子模式驱动β相到α相的转变。通过第一性原理计算研究A₃(O₃C₃N₃)₂型MOFs(A=Mg, Ca, Sr, Ba)的结构、铁电性和光学性质，并评估双稳态极化态之间的转换势垒、动力学和热稳定性。
AI.result: 发现这些MOFs具有5.5-5.7 eV的超宽带隙，存在铁电α相，相变由Γ₂⁻声子模式驱动。计算了极化态转换势垒，并证实所有MOFs具有动力学和热稳定性，适合高温应用。
AI.conclusion: A₃(O₃C₃N₃)₂型MOFs是具有超宽带隙的铁电材料，在高温下稳定，为解决窄带隙半导体在高温应用中的限制提供了有前景的解决方案。

title: Composition/structure directed search for new chalcogenide compounds
summary: This work presents a simple scheme for finding new crystalline compounds by adapting structure types from neighbor atoms compounds. The approach is demonstrated for the selenide and sulfide families of binary compounds. It predicts ten new compounds that are not currently included in the inorganic crystal structure database (ICSD). The compounds primarily originated from a small search domain that includes near neighbors. Comparison with extended searches that include structures from binary systems of more remote atoms in the periodic table demonstrate the relative efficiency of near neighbor screening. This points at the possibility of using similar directed searches as a heuristic rule for efficiently finding new stable compounds in additional compound families.

AI.tldr: 提出一种基于邻近原子化合物结构类型寻找新晶体化合物的简单方法，在硫化物和硒化物家族中预测了10个ICSD数据库未收录的新化合物
AI.motivation: 开发一种高效发现新晶体化合物的方法，利用邻近原子化合物的结构相似性来指导搜索，避免大规模计算筛选
AI.method: 通过调整邻近原子化合物的结构类型来预测新化合物，在硫化物和硒化物二元化合物家族中应用该方法，比较近邻搜索与扩展远程搜索的效率
AI.result: 成功预测了10个ICSD数据库中未收录的新化合物，主要来自近邻搜索域，证明近邻筛选比远程原子系统搜索更高效
AI.conclusion: 邻近原子结构相似性可作为启发式规则，用于高效发现其他化合物家族中的新稳定化合物，为定向搜索提供有效策略

title: Performance and reliability potential of Bi$_2$O$_2$Se/Bi$_2$SeO$_5$ transistors
summary: While 2D materials have enormous potential for future device technologies, many challenges must be overcome before they can be deployed at an industrial scale. One of these challenges is identifying the right semiconductor/insulator combination that ensures high performance, stability, and reliability. In contrast to conventional 2D interfaces, which suffer from van der Waals gaps or covalent bonding issues, zippered structures such as the high-mobility 2D semiconductor Bi$_2$O$_2$Se and its native high-$κ$ oxide Bi$_2$SeO$_5$ offer high-quality interfaces, good scalability, and excellent device performance. While most prior work has focused mainly on basic device behavior, here we also thoroughly assess the stability and reliability of this material system using a multiscale approach that integrates electrical characterization, density functional theory, and TCAD simulations, linking atomistic states to device-scale reliability. By analyzing four transistor design generations (top-gated, fin, and two gate-all-around FETs), we provide realistic predictions for how this system performs at the ultimate scaling limit. We identify oxygen-related defects in the oxide as the main contributors to hysteresis and recoverable threshold shifts, and we propose mitigation strategies through encapsulation or oxygen-rich annealing. Benchmarking the extracted material parameters against IRDS 2037 requirements, we demonstrate that Bi$_2$O$_2$Se/Bi$_2$SeO$_5$ transistors can achieve high drain and low gate currents at ultra-scaled conditions. These findings position this material system as a technologically credible and manufacturing-relevant pathway for future nanoelectronics.

AI.tldr: 研究评估了Bi₂O₂Se/Bi₂SeO₅二维材料系统的稳定性与可靠性，通过多尺度方法分析四种晶体管设计，证明其在极限缩放条件下能满足未来纳米电子学需求。
AI.motivation: 二维材料在工业应用中面临半导体/绝缘体组合选择的挑战，传统二维界面存在范德华间隙或共价键问题。Bi₂O₂Se及其原生氧化物Bi₂SeO₅形成的"拉链"结构提供了高质量界面，但先前研究主要关注基本器件行为，缺乏对稳定性和可靠性的全面评估。
AI.method: 采用多尺度方法整合电学表征、密度泛函理论和TCAD模拟，将原子态与器件尺度可靠性联系起来。分析了四代晶体管设计（顶栅、鳍式和两种全环绕栅FET），通过封装或富氧退火等策略缓解缺陷问题。
AI.result: 氧化物中的氧相关缺陷是迟滞和可恢复阈值漂移的主要来源。提取的材料参数符合IRDS 2037要求，Bi₂O₂Se/Bi₂SeO₅晶体管在超缩放条件下能实现高漏极电流和低栅极电流。
AI.conclusion: Bi₂O₂Se/Bi₂SeO₅材料系统具有技术可信度和制造相关性，为未来纳米电子学提供了可行的技术路径，特别是在极限缩放条件下表现出优越性能。

title: Computational Approach to Investigate Structure-Property Relationship of a series of Carbazole Containing Thermally Activated Delayed Fluorescent Molecules
summary: Donor-acceptor type compounds are an important category of organic materials that show properties suitable for light emission applications. To achieve a full understanding of the mechanism of thermally activated delayed fluorescence (TADF) process, we studied the structure-property relationship for a series of carbazole based TADF emitters, 2CzPN, 4CzPN, 4CzIPN, 4CzBN and 5CzBN. We applied density functional theory to investigate kinetic and electronic properties. We find that the energetic position of triplet excited state of these emitters depends on their molecular structure. Our findings emphasize that to enable reverse intersystem crossing and eventually TADF, strong spin orbit coupling and minimal energy difference between singlet and triplet states $ΔE_{ST}$ must be obtained simultaneously. We also find that the reverse intersystem crossing rates $k_{RISC}$ values are higher where $ΔE_{ST}$ values are closer to reorganization energy. Furthermore, a small change in the absorption peak of optical absorption spectra with and without spin orbit coupling (SOC) is observed for each emitter. This result is extremely beneficial for the design of new TADF molecules, and we believe that our work contributes to the progress of future development of high-performance organic molecular light-emitting devices.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过DFT计算分析了五种咔唑基TADF发射体的结构-性能关系，发现实现TADF需要同时具备强自旋轨道耦合和小的ΔE_ST，且k_RISC在ΔE_ST接近重组能时更高。
AI.motivation: 为了全面理解热激活延迟荧光(TADF)过程的机制，研究咔唑基TADF发射体的结构-性能关系，为设计高性能有机发光器件提供指导。
AI.method: 采用密度泛函理论(DFT)研究五种咔唑基TADF发射体(2CzPN、4CzPN、4CzIPN、4CzBN和5CzBN)的动力学和电子性质，分析其结构变化对性能的影响。
AI.result: 发现三重激发态的能量位置取决于分子结构；实现反向系间窜越和TADF需要同时具备强自旋轨道耦合和小的ΔE_ST；当ΔE_ST接近重组能时，k_RISC值更高；观察到有/无自旋轨道耦合时吸收光谱峰值仅有微小变化。
AI.conclusion: 该研究结果对新TADF分子的设计极为有益，有助于推动高性能有机分子发光器件的未来发展。

title: Structural, physical, and Judd-Ofelt analysis of germanium magnesium-telluroborate glass containing different amounts of Tm2O3
summary: Germanium magnesium-telluroborate glasses with the composition 78B2O3-10GeO2-5TeO2-7-x MgO-xTm2O3, x = 0, 0.25, 0.5, 1, and 1.5 mol% were fabricated by using the melt quenching process. With the increase of Tm2O3 concentration, the density values increase from 3.574 to 4.153 g.cm-1, while the molar volume values decrease from 21.145 to 19.445 cm3/mol. Fourier transform infrared analysis supports the existence and conversion of BO3 and BO4. The conversion of BO3 to BO4 would lead to greater bridging oxygens BOs, influencing and reinforcing the glass network. The optical features were studied. The optical band gap decreased by increasing Tm2O3 content in the glass formula, while the index of refraction increased. The parameters take the values between 3.16 eV and 2.31 eV. Other optical and physical constants were determined like optical conductivity, electronegativity, metallization, reflection loss, steepness parameters, and transmission coefficient. Judd-Ofelt theory is used to estimate the optical intensities and line strengths of the present glasses. Radiative lifetimes and branching ratios are evaluated of different manifolds belonging to Tm3+ doped present glasses. The results showed the possibility of potential applications for these materials in the fields of laser development, Light-emitting diodes (LEDs), optical amplification and optoelectronic devices.

AI.tldr: 该研究制备了Tm³⁺掺杂的锗镁-碲硼酸盐玻璃，通过改变Tm₂O₃浓度研究了其结构、光学性质及Judd-Ofelt参数，发现材料在激光、LED和光放大等领域具有应用潜力。
AI.motivation: 研究Tm³⁺掺杂的硼酸盐玻璃系统，旨在开发具有优良光学性能的新型玻璃材料，用于激光器、LED、光放大器和光电器件等应用领域。
AI.method: 采用熔融淬火法制备78B₂O₃-10GeO₂-5TeO₂-7-x MgO-xTm₂O₃玻璃（x=0-1.5 mol%），通过密度测量、傅里叶变换红外光谱分析结构，研究光学带隙、折射率等光学性质，并应用Judd-Ofelt理论计算辐射寿命和分支比。
AI.result: 随着Tm₂O₃浓度增加，密度从3.574增至4.153 g/cm³，摩尔体积从21.145降至19.445 cm³/mol；BO₃向BO₄转化增强了玻璃网络；光学带隙从3.16降至2.31 eV，折射率增加；Judd-Ofelt分析表明材料具有优良的辐射特性。
AI.conclusion: Tm³⁺掺杂的锗镁-碲硼酸盐玻璃表现出优异的结构和光学性能，在激光器、LED、光放大器和光电器件等领域具有潜在应用价值。
